00029 class OptMethod {
00030 public:
00041         virtual double Optimize(Area * area, Function * func, StopCriterion * stopCrit, int * iter) = 0;
00042         void SetStartPoint(vector<double> x) { StartPoint = x; }
00043         vector<double> GetFinalPoint() { return xFin; }
00044         virtual ~OptMethod() {}
00045 
00046 
00047 protected:
00048         // StartPoint is the optimization start point
00049         vector<double>  StartPoint;
00050         // xFin is the optimization end point
00051         vector<double> xFin;
00052 };

00054 class CoordinateDescent : public OptMethod {
00055 public:
00056         
00057         double Optimize(Area * area, Function * func, StopCriterion * stopCrit, int * iter) override;
00058         ~CoordinateDescent() {}

00063         double Optimize(Area * area, Function * func, StopCriterion * stopCrit, int * iter) override;
00064         ~StohasticSearch() {}
00065         double prob;
00066         void SetP(double x) { prob = x; }
